::Incarcinator::

Incarcinator wasn't sure whether the shuttle was on his side or not.
It hadn't tried to hit him again after the first time, and it hadn't
opened fire either, so he lets it pass without trouble.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Scorpius (No last name)" <scorpiusis@h...> wrote:

over

hit him
